stimulusHtml: The artist of the painting shown used which of the following techniques in the scene depicted?

features.html: Kunsthistorisches Museum Wien

choicesHtml: Atmospheric perspective through the inclusion of cool colors in the background
Tenebrism through the inclusion of contrasting light and dark areas
One-point perspective through the inclusion of a single vanishing point
Symmetrical balance through the inclusion of a central axis to divide the composition
